meanings.definition: The quality or state of being select.
meanings.sent1: Her selectness in choosing the best ingredients for the recipe made it delicious.
meanings.sent2: The selectness of the team's players ensured their victory in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The selectness of the cat in choosing its favorite spot to nap always amused the family.
meanings.sent4: His selectness in picking out the perfect gift for his girlfriend was like finding a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The selectness of the diamond sparkled brightly in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The act of selecting or choosing carefully.
meanings.sent1: The selectness of her decision-making process impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: With great selectness, he picked out the best candidate for the job.
meanings.sent3: The selectness with which the child chose his toys often led to interesting playtime scenarios.
meanings.sent4: Her selectness in choosing the right words for the speech was like an artist selecting colors for a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The selectness of the chef in choosing the freshest ingredients elevated the dish to a whole new level of flavor.
